content: PC and OO we are planning to apply many event pattern elements as extensions. Ideally these extensions will be common to all events. Therefore after discussing with Lloyd I plan to create an event pattern extension spreadsheet to capture these extensions and populate with one or two to get it started.
I've committed an event extensions profile in .../build/profiles/event-extensions-spreadsheet.xml

FYI @Melva Peters @Michelle (Moseman) Miller @Jose Costa Teixeira and anybody else trying to align to the event patterns from workflow. I have created pretty generic extensions for reuse can just add your resource and c'est voila.
